body:
Day 9 - Manga 144*
So they were two different girls.
Alright then. That explains the punch.
I think that was first half was the best, that was until the skinny man went after, and masturbated, to the girl of another man. Nevertheless, without any problem, the guy managed to get the girl and my man fucked the other girl so, everyone won in the end.
4/10.
First half killed my boner too much to enjoy the rest....
I wish the first half didn't exist, then this would be perfect

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me (i accidentally read this comment, so sorry
I remember this one; the cover page is what attracts me, but I was too young to fully understand the content.
